duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and evaluate board and cable designs for system modules and components of multi-functional systems
Develop electronic systems that may include low level motion controllers, sensor interfaces and data acquisition, and system test bed utilities for electro-mechanical systems
Design circuit boards and sub-systems of limited to moderate scope using CAD/CAE tools
Plan and conduct tests to verify theoretical analysis; performs empirical analysis

education_certification.credential: Bachelors degree in Electrical or Biomedical engineering with electrical background
